meta.title: Maori Keyboard
meta.description: Easily type in Maori with our online Maori keyboard - perfect for typing in te reo Māori.

faqs.question: How to use this Maori keyboard?
faqs.answer: This keyboard has been designed to mimic Microsoft's Maori IME. To type a long vowel with a macron, you just need to add an acute before the vowel. For example ` + o will come out as ō. I am always looking to improve the keyboards on this site, so please let me know if you have any suggestions.
